attributes.action: stop animal owners allowing their animals to urinate or defecate on any private or public land without the land owner's permission.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All owners of animals should be liable to a fine for permitting their animals to urinate or deficate on any private or public land without the land owner's permission.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Cat-Poo/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
